channel.title: A class that can kill someone during the day
channel.description: I saw someone make a joke about Day Vigs and is day vig just bad for the game or can I just make a class that has a day vig ability

item.title: A class that can kill someone during the day
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
It would be good for Assassin as a last ditch attempt to kill a class. Dayvig and auto put up on trial like someone else said (probably orange, you can look it up)

Read full topic

item.source: A class that can kill someone during the day

item.title: A class that can kill someone during the day
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
Firelitten:

Sad times. It’s so hard to come up with neutrals cause the objectives become to Similar after a while.

honestly if you ask me… the game doesn’t really have a shortage of neuts… if you ask me the category it is really hurting in, is non-confirmable BDs. In many ways I’d say we have too many neuts more than too few… inq IMO was a silly addition, (No he dosn’t balance sorc, because he’s incapable of actually catching sorc, full court frame makes sure his false positive rate is too silly high to actually act on.

Read full topic
